Text:
If your computer is running the game at a low framerate, you will want to try this:

Go to your documents folder, navigate to "Codemasters\GRID\hardwaresettings", and open the file "hardware_settings_config.xml".

There you will find the line: 


Change both to false, like so: 


Or mix and match to find a setting you like.

Recommended system requirements

Same problem as welshyben & cesco

Found it!

If your game crashes, you need to install the latest openAL. 
http://connect.creativelabs.com/openal/Downloads/Forms/AllItems.aspx
If it still crashes, make sure to delete "hardware_settings_config.xml" and all your savegames.
I give up. It still crashes for no reason.

Works perfectly, no issues.
Works in wine also.

A controller is not a must but its helpful... i played this on xbox for ages and even the first time using a keyboard i was just as good. You will probably want to remap the keys to AWD (And down arrow for brake so you have more flexibility) and when exiting a corner its helpful to tap accel a few times so you dont just spin out (Since you cant feather the throttle without a pad)
